name: Black Spear
simpleDescription: Kalista's spear that binds an Oathsworn Ally.

active.name: Oathsworn Bond
active.effects: Consumes this item to initiate a 3.5s-second cast time and a 3-second channel afterwards from the user and the target allied champion, both becoming bound allies. The target is unable to act for 6 seconds after the channel's duration. Afterwards, the target becomes an Oathsworn.
